NAME: DocumentService should be defined
DocumentService createDocument should create a new document
DocumentService findOne should find a document by options
DocumentService findOne should throw NotFoundException if document not found
DocumentService findById should find a document by id
DocumentService findById should throw NotFoundException if document not found
DocumentService addDocumentForUser should add a document for a user
DocumentService addDocumentForUser should throw error if user not found
CandidatService should be defined
CandidatService createCandidat should create a new candidat and send confirmation email
CandidatService findAll should return all candidats
CandidatService findOne should return a candidat by id
CandidatService findOne should throw NotFoundException if candidat is not found
CandidatService update should update a candidat by id
CandidatService update should throw NotFoundException if candidat is not found
CandidatService remove should remove a candidat by id
CandidatService remove should throw NotFoundException if candidat is not found
CandidatService search should return candidats matching the query
CandidatService search should return an empty array if no candidats match the query
InformationsExtraitesService should be defined
InformationsExtraitesService addInformationsExtraiteForDocument should add information extraite for a document
CandidatController should be defined
CandidatController #createCandidat should call service.createCandidat and return the created candidat
CandidatController #createCandidat should return internal server error if service throws an error
CandidatController #findAll should return all candidats
CandidatController #findAll should return internal server error if service throws an error
CandidatController #findOne should return a specific candidat
CandidatController #findOne should return internal server error if service throws an error
CandidatController #update should update a specific candidat
CandidatController #update should return internal server error if service throws an error
CandidatController #remove should remove a specific candidat
CandidatController #remove should return internal server error if service throws an error
CandidatController #searchCandidats should search candidats
CandidatController #searchCandidats should return internal server error if service throws an error

DocumentController should handle invalid file upload
